message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses a Bayesian alternative to the softmax in neural networks for classification tasks, which is a common topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of the proposed method in computer vision tasks (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper discusses the advantages of Bayesian approaches, which is a topic commonly discussed in neural networks and computational neuroscience, making cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) a likely sub-category as well.
